item.title: 如何使用hugo搭建一个个人博客？
item.author: xialiaoliao0911@gmail.com (Gavin Stone)
item.description: #如何使用hugo搭建一个个人博客？ 1.下载二进制安装包文件 2.解压安装包 cd /usr/local mkdir hugo cd hugo tar -xf hugo_0.70.0_Linux-64bit.tar.gz 3.创建网站 cd /usr/local/hugo ./hugo new site 4.下载主题 $ cd /usr/local/hugo/site $ cd themes $ git clone https://github.com/enten/hyde-y 5.修改配置文件 1)切换目录 cd /usr/local/hugo/site 2)修改配置文件config.toml [root@gavin site]# more config.toml # hostname (and path) to the root eg. http://spf13.com/ baseurl = "http://www.example.com" # Site title title = "Gavin Stone's Blog" # Copyright copyright = "(c) 2020 Gavin Stone." # Language #languageCode = "en-EN" languageCode = "zh-CN" # Metadata format # "yaml", "toml", "json" metaDataFormat = "yaml" # Theme to use (located in /themes/THEMENAME/) theme = "hyde-y" # Pagination paginate = 10 paginatePath = "page" # Enable Disqus integration disqusShortname = "Gavin" [permalinks] post = "/:year/:month/:day/:slug/" code = "/:slug/" [taxonomies] tag = "tags" topic = "topics" [author] name = "Gavin Stone" email = "xialiaoliao0911@gmail.
